== Introduction ==

We hope to discuss the structure and leadership (on the mailing list)
and be prepared to take action (vote) on team structure and leadership
at this next meeting. If you have a specific structure proposal, send it
to the list as a separate email and if you wish to discuss that
proposal, reply to it on the list.
